book.synopsis: Shocked that her parents are cooking Chinese food to sell in the family store on an all-American holiday, a feisty Chinese American girl tries to tell her mother and father how things really are. But as the parade passes by and fireworks light the sky, she learns a surprising lesson.
book.dimensions: Height: 0.14 Inches, Length: 11.02 Inches, Weight: 0.42 Pounds, Width: 8.46 Inches
